{{Wired embedded system |brand=SolidRun |model=CuBox |manuf_country=Israel |is_manuf=No |availability=common |est_release_date=01/2012 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP510;88AP5-BJV2; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q032A |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63BFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, console,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, I2C Programmable CMOS Clock Generator & VCXO;Silicon Labs;Si5351;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, S/PDIF, IrDA, RTC w/ battery, eSATA |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell v5.4.4 NQ; |tp_firmware=Android, Ubuntu |oui_eth=00:50:43 }} {{TagLine|SolidRun CuBox SBC}} :[http://www.solid-run.com/products/cubox Product page]
{{See also|SolidRun|List of SBCs}}
By default comes with a 2GB microSD card dual-booting Android and Ubuntu. :Began shipping in January, 2012.
===Links=== *[[Wikipedia:CuBox]]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @800MHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0, OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 4MB Serial (NOR) Flash, eSATA port, :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Host) ports *Power: 5V/2A via barrel plug
==Images== <gallery> File:SolidRun CuBox Top.jpeg|Board top File:SolidRun CuBox Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom File:SolidRun CuBox Front.jpeg|Front view File:SolidRun CuBox Back.jpeg|Back view </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
